All Implemented Interfaces:
SetOfPoints
public class PerpendicularBisector
extends Line

Class description:
Class for construction of perpendicular bisector of given segment

Version:
1.00
Author:
Ivan Petrovic

findBestPointsForInstantation

public int findBestPointsForInstantation(PointSetRelationshipManager manager)
Description copied from class: Line
Finding best points for instantiation. In base class this method will implement the default behavior considering this line as plain line through two points.

Specified by:
findBestPointsForInstantation in interface SetOfPoints
Overrides:
findBestPointsForInstantation in class Line
Parameters:
manager - Object which contains the relationship between a point and a set
Returns:
SUCCESS if execution was successful and ERR_CODE_GENERAL in case of error
See Also:
Line.findBestPointsForInstantation(com.ogprover.prover_protocol.cp.auxiliary.PointSetRelationshipManager)

instantiateConditionFromBasicElements

public XPolynomial instantiateConditionFromBasicElements(Point P)
Description copied from interface: SetOfPoints
Method that returns X-polynomial which is instance of symbolic condition that some point belongs to this set of points. Instance is made for point passed in as argument and for other basic points that constitute this set of points.

Parameters:
P - Given point for which condition is instantiated
Returns:
XPolynomial object that represents the instantiated condition or null in case of error
See Also:
SetOfPoints.instantiateConditionFromBasicElements(com.ogprover.prover_protocol.cp.geoconstruction.Point)

getAllPossibleConditionsWithMappings

public java.util.Map<SymbolicPolynomial,java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Point>>> getAllPossibleConditionsWithMappings()
Description copied from interface: SetOfPoints
Method that retrieves map with all symbolic conditions that could be applied for this set of points, together with list of all mappings of points to symbolic labels necessary for instantiation except generic label M0 for some arbitrary point from this set - this mapping is added at the moment of instantiation when this point is known.

Specified by:
getAllPossibleConditionsWithMappings in interface SetOfPoints
Overrides:
getAllPossibleConditionsWithMappings in class Line
Returns:
Map with symbolic polynomials and corresponding list of mappings of labels to points
See Also:
Line.getAllPossibleConditionsWithMappings()

getInputLabels

public java.lang.String[] getInputLabels()
Description copied from class: GeoConstruction
Method which retrieves a string array with labels of input elements for this construction. The retrieved array doesn't contain duplicate labels.
